text: Is anyone else noticing since the move to the new content settings, things that were in the Site Header/Site Footer HTML areas didnt carry over?
This is happening for some portals. If you send me your portal Id I can get you ungated for the fix

<@U22PJPGK0> <@U22PNRAJD> do you guys know anything about this? I'm concerned that our development team is going to spend time doing a work around for all the clients we are currently managing and then will have to go back into each account to fix it. Possibly doubling work and losing fee. Our devs have talked to support a few times, but we haven't seen much of a response
Hi guys, we're looking into it this week. I'll report back here with updates.
Is there anyway using workflows where when someone fills out a form, you can send the webhook to create a hubdb row with information from the form?
Not sure you can specify the request parameters like that.. It does allow you to POST tho.
Something funky going on with Content Staging? When we try to create a new staged page it throws it into Website Pages straight away??
